title: What is one thing, if invented now, would influence the next 1000 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Teleportation. Teleportation would disrupt travel and trade but by doing so it would end up bringing the world closer than it already is. Human beings will have to come to terms with the fact that they are not confined by their regional politics and cultures. Also it would be a leap forward for physics and would shape our understanding of science for years to come.
Cold fusion. Barring that, a vast and sudden uptick in solar efficiency conversion. Readily available, ultra cheap, ultra clean energy available to all would transform most economies forever.
